Hello: I am new to linux and currently running Ubuntu 9.04 from virtual box. an somebody please tell what are the executable files in linux. Thank you.

executable files are just files.. there is not special ending such as in windows .exe... instead they are marked executable.. in the same way that a file in windows can be marked "Hidden" for example.. just a flag you set.. without changing the file name
you've downloaded it? why not just run "sudo apt-get install apache".. or use synaptic and point'n'click..
